text: Tom Upham (born May 2, 1943) is an American skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1968 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:American male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of the United States Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lewiston, Maine
title: Tom Upham
